Package dataAccess

Class DBCustomers

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.DBCustomers
public class DBCustomers extends Object
This class handles SQL queries regarding customers.

    • DBCustomers

      public DBCustomers()

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> getAllCustomers()
      This method returns all customers in the database in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all customers and columns for customers. A new customer instance is created for each
      customer record using a while loop. The customers are added to an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of customers

    • getSelectedCustomer

      public static Customers getSelectedCustomer(Appointments appointment)
      This method returns one selected customer from the database. An SQL query returns all customers and customer columns. A while loop iterates through all customers to find a match. A match is made
      when the customer ID of the appointment matches the customer ID of a customer in the database. That customer is returned.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment for which to find its associated customer
      Returns:
      the customer associated with the selected appointment.

    • addCustomer

      public static int addCustomer(Customers customer) throws SQLException
      This method adds a customer to the database. A customer is added to the database with an INSERT statement. The values for the parameter indices are set using the
      associated getter methods of the Customers class.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be added
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • modifyCustomer

      public static int modifyCustomer(Customers customer) throws SQLException
      This method modifies a customer to the database. A customer is modified in the database with an UPDATE statement. The values for the parameter indices are set using the
      associated getter methods of the Customers class.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be modified
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteCustomer

      public static int deleteCustomer(Customers customer) throws SQLException
      This method deletes a customer and any associated appointments from the database. A customer and their appointments are deleted from the database with DELETE statements. The values for the parameter indices
      are set using the getCustomerId method of the Customers class.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be deleted
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException
